name: "Satisfying Weight"
description: A stone storage vessel that is said to be used for holding large amounts of Tidalga. Its lid has a small, simply-made opening into which Tidalga can be placed, though short Melusine hands cannot reach the bottom of said vessel. To the Melusines, this vessel's lid is very hard to open indeed, and thus they will only open it up together when enough Tidalga has been placed within, after which they may then enjoy a great feast...
